text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: At long last, the witch had found her way to the world outside.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Everywhere she looked, she saw sights she had never seen before, 
sights filled with wonder.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
If I could use my magic in this beautiful world, how joyous it would be! 
Her heart leapt with excitement.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
She told the people of the world outside, "I'll use my magic to make 
your wishes come true."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But when she began to cast a spell, the people all ran away from her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The people of the world outside saw magic as a terrifying force.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
They feared that magic might change the way of the world, the one 
they knew so well.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch said to them, "I want to use my magic to make everyone 
happy."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
To prove she meant it, she used magic to fly up into the sky. "See? 
With this, you can go wherever you like."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But the people only grew more afraid, and began to shun the witch.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Now she was all alone in the world outside.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "Why do I have these powers?" she wondered once more.

Onstage for her winning concert following the Kikuka Sho, Rice 
Shower's reception is less than stellar.

The crowd greets her with harsh stares and harsher words for denying 
Mihono Bourbon's Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I came here to watch Mihono Bourbon win!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: Man, I wanted to see Mihono Bourbon at center stage.
Not a single voice can be heard praising today's victor.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: What are they… But Rice won…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Screw it, Imma shut 'em up myself!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No, you will not. Just leave it be. Many were eager to see Bourbon 
achieve the Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But c'mon…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I've a much better idea.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice! You ran spectacularly today!

As boos echo across the stadium, McQueen sends a wholehearted 
cheer to the stage.

If no one else wants to sing Rice Shower's praises, then it's up to us to 
do so, as her teammates.

If no one else wants to sing Rice Shower's praises, then it's up to us to 
do so, as her teammates.

As I let loose a cheer of my own, a balloon floats up into the air, with 
a banner drooping down from it.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what's the deal with that?! It says "Congrats on the Triple 
Crown"!

Someone must've let go of it by mistake. But the damage is already 
done.

Up on stage, Rice's voice shrinks to a quivering whine. I've never 
been to a winning concert that felt so long.
Aw, don't look so sad! You finally got your big win!
Aw, don't look so sad! You finally got your big win!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's right! Let's have Trainer take us to the amusement park again!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the actual famous one this time!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Thanks, guys.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But I'm kinda tired. I think I'll just go home.
She walks out of the room, with her head hanging low.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: …Looks like it really got to her.

Defeating the undefeated Mihono Bourbon was a big 
achievement—but one that fans couldn't accept.
I knew there'd be some backlash, but not this much.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
One can hardly blame her. To work so hard, only to be rewarded like 
that…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Nevertheless, she must find a way to overcome this.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Such is the duty of a victor… of one who runs with the hopes of so 
many on her shoulders.
The duty of one who runs with the hopes of many on her shoulders…
In the moment, I'm not sure if I fully understand what she means.
A few days later…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huff… puff…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: A full second behind McQueen. Not in the groove today either, huh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah… Sorry.

McQueen hasn't made a full recovery yet, but she's starting to train 
again.
Even with the advantage, though, Rice is struggling to keep up.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Meh, we could all do better. McQueen's scrambling to rein in her 
cravings now that she's running again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Am not! Could you not make things up?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A third consecutive win in the Tenno Sho is on the line for me. I've 
much training to make up for.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Rice, let's give it another go. In my current state, you ought to be 
able to pass me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Okay, I'll try my best.
They run a few more laps, but she's never able to overtake McQueen.
Later in the day…
Knock, knock

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, if I may.

McQueen pays a surprise late-night visit to my office, her face more 
stern than usual.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I've a favor to ask you with regards to the Tenno Sho.

Her expression tells me this is going to be serious. And with dead 
silence replacing the room's usual cheer, I start to feel almost nervous.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The spring Tenno Sho that my third win depends on…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'd like you to let Rice race in it too.
